Magic Notes:
Archdruid: Unlimited Wild Shape
Circle Forms: Increase Wild Shape CR to 6
Druid Bonus Cantrip: Additional Druid cantrip
Magic Initiate (Wizard): Know 2 W0 spells, cast 1 W1 spell/long rest
Beast Spells: Cast spells during Wild Shape
Combat Wild Shape: Use spell slot to regain (slot level)d8 HP during Wild Shape
Elemental Adept (Cold): Cold spells ignore resistance; treat 1s as 2s on damage die
Elemental Adept (Thunder): Thunder spells ignore resistance; treat 1s as 2s on damage die
Elemental Wild Shape: Use 2 Wild Shape uses to become an elemental
Natural Recovery: Recover 10 spell slot levels during short rest 1/long rest
Ritual Casting: Cast known spell as ritual
Thousand Forms: Alter Self at will
Wild Shape: Transform into CR 6 creature for 10 hr unlimited/short rest
Notes
* Ability Boosts: +1 Constitution
Validation Errors: Selectable Feature Allocation: 1 available vs. 9 allocated
